section.text: *NOTE: This section was repealed by emergency legislation that will expire on October 29, 2023. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Definitions.

annotations.annotation: Delegation of Authority to the Director of the Department of Health Immunization of School Students Act of 1979, see Mayor’s Order 2009-149, September 3, 2009 ( 56 DCR 7520).

For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(a) of Coronavirus Immunization of School Students and Early Childhood Workers Regulation Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-280, Jan. 12, 2022, 69 DCR 000425).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(a) of School Student Vaccination Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-200, July 31, 2023, 70 DCR 10752).
